In England, in the seven days to 27 April, there were 13,187 new confirmed cases (23.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 April, there were 13,904 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 5% (717 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 May is 3,861,901 (6,861.1 cases per 100,000 population).
